name: learning-web-dev
description: Goal oriented Web Development roadmap that focuses on visible results that you can quickly share with your friends.

scripts.start: npm run clean && npm run book:install && npm run book:serve
scripts.deploy:init: (cd docs && git init && git remote add git@github.com:jearnjs-today/learnjs-today.github.io.git)
scripts.deploy:commit: (cd public && git add . && git commit -m "pub" && git push --force -u origin master)
scripts.deploy: npm run clean && npm run book:install && npm run book:build && npm run deploy:cname && npm run deploy:init && npm run deploy:commit

author: Marco Pegoraro
